name: Slime Escape (robbossmango89, Bradleydoesgame, RobinsonDillon94, RedX16)
description:
Somewhere in an unknown facility deep underground, a slime found himself free from his containment. With the help of you and a flying robot that the slime can control, try to escape the facility.

How to play: Move the slime with A and D key. The slime can jump with SPACE key. The flying robot can be move with the arrow keys or JIKL keys. The slime must find a key in each level and bring it to the keyhole to unlock the door while avoiding traps and hazards. The flying robot is immune to these hazards so the slime can use it as a movable platform.

ESC key to pause game, restart level, go back to main menu.
